FYI, regarding Alexa's crawler request headers, Andy at Alexa writes:

> Our current implementation sends only
> 
> GET /foo.html HTTP/1.0
> <Cookies>
> Connection: close
> Host: foo.com
> User-Agent: ia_archiver
> From: crawler@...
> 
> I don't know why we use 1.0 instead of 1.1.
> 
> adj
